import React from 'react' import TableDragSelect from "react-table-drag-select"; import "react-table-drag-select/style.css"; export default class Calendar extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); const days = [ 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday' ]; const startTime = 8; const endTime = 5; const numRows = 7; let cells = []; for (let i = 0; i < numRows + 1; i++) { cells.push(Array(days.length).fill('false')); } this.state = { cells: [ [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false] ] }; } render = () =>
Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday 10:00 overtime 11:00 overtime 12:00 overtime 13:00 overtime 14:00 overtime 15:00 overtime 16:00 overtime
; handleChange = cells => this.setState({ cells }); handleClick = () => { const cells = [ [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false], [false, false, false, false, false, false, false] ]; this.setState({ cells }); }; }
